content: chain slip_stitch into next 2 st of hat 8sc row 2 ws turn and without chaining 1blsc in next 7sts single_crochet into both loops for last st 8sc when looking for the 1st blsc remember to skip the 2 slsts row 3 rs ch1 and turn 1blsc in next 8sts slip_stitch into next 2sts of hat repeat row 2 and 3 until no sts are left to be worked into on the hat once all sts are worked join the ends with slsts ch1 and fasten_off foliage instructions vine using 4mm hook and green ch20 row 1 rs 3sc in 2nd chain from hook 3sc in each chain ch1 and fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing 60sc leaf using 4mm hook and green ch12 row 1 rs working in back bumps 1sc in 2nd chain from hook 1sc in next 9ch 3sc in next chain working into other side of chs 1sc in next 8ch skip the last 2 chs row 2 ws ch1 and turn 1blsc into next 9sts 3blsc in next st 1blsc in next 8sts 1sc through both loops skip last 2 sts row 3 rs ch1 and turn 1blsc in next 10sts 3blsc in next st 1blsc in next 7sts 1sc through both loops skip last 2 sts row 4-5 repeat row 2 and 3 one more time row 6 ws ch1 and turn 1blsc in next 9sts 1sc in both loops ch5 1sc in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in next 3ch 1sc into same st on leaf 1blsc in next 8sts 1sc through both loops skip last 2 sts ch1 and fasten_off finishing using a tapestry needle sew on the leaf and vine to the stem block and weave in ends then wear and enjoy 😁 questions email bunbunhandmakes@gmail com if you have any questions at all please feel free to reach out to me and i will do my best to help you out 🙂
